question: Some companies sponsor sport as a way to advertise themselves. Some people think it is good, while others think there are disadvantagesDiscuss both views and give your opinion
text: Sport helps us to keep healthy life . Nowadays the way of advertising has changed.  It is asserted by an array of individuals  that  few businesses  sponsor the sport as a way of  advertising  is a good whereas people from another school of thought that it has a demerits . Before  forming  any  opinion ,  both  the aspect must be discussed thoroughly

Elucidating in details, multifarious  reasons suggest  why masses ,believed it is a good . The first and foremost , companies can tell us about  their  latest  product which are coming in the market . For example, most of people get know about  Nickbrand through advertising in world  cup of football. However,  with the help of advert companies easily increases their employees so that it help to incline the economy  growth of any business.  Moreover,  most of the people live sport they buy their product which  are companies  use in sport event.

On the other hand, opposers think that it has more demerits.  Primarily, advertisements companies persuade us to follow the latest trend and encourage us to associated a certain brand with a high status. Furthermore,  children are more attract towards the advert and some of them put pressure on their parents to buy this things. Last but not the least, people who are interested in sports spend more money on things related to sports.  For instance, a survey  conducted  In  which  depicts the 40% of people  spend money  to buy this things which are  connected  with sports  .
To conclude,  sponsoring sports increase the growth of  company stock. In my opinion the disadvantages of it overweight the merits because it is wastage of time as well as public money
